issue.title: [C++] Build with JEMALLOC by default
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3482](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3482). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We already build conda packages and wheels with `jemalloc` and we have not had any user complaints about that since a long time. So this is then finally stable and should be used by default.
